languages.text: "Привязанность есть слабость". {n}Шепот Кибеллы едва касается слуха, и вы замечаете, как ее лицо становится еще более угрюмым.{/n} "Ты сделал его своим оружием. А он — тебя".
"Attachment makes us weak." {n}Kibellah's whisper is barely audible, and you see her face grow more dismal still.{/n} "You made a weapon out of him, just as he made a weapon out of you."
languages.original_text: "Привязанность есть слабость". {n}Шепот Кибеллы едва касается слуха, и вы замечаете, как ее лицо становится еще более угрюмым.{/n} "Ты сделал его своим оружием. А он — тебя".

traits.locale_text: "Attachments make you weak." {n}Kibellah's whisper can barely be heard, and you see her face grow more dismal still.{/n} "You made a weapon out of him. Just as he made a weapon out of you."
"Attachments make you weak." {n}Kibellah's whisper can barely be heard, and you see her face grow more dismal still.{/n} "You made a weapon out of him. Just as he made a weapon out of you."
"Attachments make you weak." {n}Kibellah's whisper is barely audible, and you see her face grow more dismal still.{/n} "You made a weapon out of him, just as he made a weapon out of you."

"Attachment makes us weak." {n}Kibellah's whisper is barely audible, and you see her face grow more dismal still.{/n} "You made a weapon out of him, just as he made a weapon out of you."
"Attachment makes us weak." {n}Kibellah's whisper is barely audible, and you see her face grow more dismal still.{/n} "You made a weapon out of him, just as he made a weapon out of you."

languages.text: "Bindungen machen uns schwach." {n}Kibellahs Flüstern ist kaum hörbar, und du siehst, wie ihr Ausdruck noch elender wird.{/n} "Ihr habt eine Waffe aus ihm gemacht, so wie er eine Waffe aus Euch gemacht hat."
languages.original_text: "Attachment makes us weak." {n}Kibellah's whisper is barely audible, and you see her face grow more dismal still.{/n} "You made a weapon out of him, just as he made a weapon out of you."

traits.locale_text: "Bindungen sind eine Schwäche." {n}Kibellahs Flüstern ist kaum hörbar, und du siehst, wie ihr Ausdruck noch elender wird.{/n} "Ihr habt eine Waffe aus ihm gemacht, so wie er eine Waffe aus Euch gemacht hat."

languages.text: «El apego nos hace débiles». {n}El susurro de Kibellah es apenas perceptible, y ves que su rostro se ensombrece aún más.{/n} «Lo ha convertido en un arma, igual que él hizo un arma de usted».
languages.original_text: "Attachment makes us weak." {n}Kibellah's whisper is barely audible, and you see her face grow more dismal still.{/n} "You made a weapon out of him, just as he made a weapon out of you."

traits.locale_text: «El apego es debilidad». {n}El susurro de Kibellah es apenas perceptible, y ves que su rostro se ensombrece aún más.{/n} «Lo ha convertido en un arma, igual que él hizo un arma de usted».

languages.text: 「執着は弱さ」{n}キベラの呟きがかすかに聞こえて、彼女の表情はさらに険しくなった。{/n}「あなたが彼を武器にしたように、彼もまた我を武器にした」
languages.original_text: "Attachment makes us weak." {n}Kibellah's whisper is barely audible, and you see her face grow more dismal still.{/n} "You made a weapon out of him, just as he made a weapon out of you."

traits.locale_text: 「執着は弱さ」{n}キベラの呟きがかすかに聞こえて、彼女の表情はさらに険しくなった。{/n}「彼があなたを武器にしたように、あなたは彼を武器にしたのね」

languages.text: “情感与依恋会让我们变得软弱。”{n}绮贝菈发出了几乎听不到的低语声，你注意到她的表情变得更加忧郁。{/n}“你把他变成了武器，正如他把你变成了武器一样。”
languages.original_text: "Attachment makes us weak." {n}Kibellah's whisper is barely audible, and you see her face grow more dismal still.{/n} "You made a weapon out of him, just as he made a weapon out of you."

traits.locale_text: “感情依恋会让人变得软弱。”{n}绮贝菈发出了几乎听不到的低语声，你注意到她的表情变得更加忧郁。{/n}“你把他变成了武器，正如他把你变成了武器一样。”

languages.text: « L'attachement nous rend faibles. {n}Le murmure de Kibellah est à peine audible, et vous voyez son visage s'assombrir encore davantage.{/n} Vous avez fait de lui une arme, et réciproquement. »
languages.original_text: "Attachment makes us weak." {n}Kibellah's whisper is barely audible, and you see her face grow more dismal still.{/n} "You made a weapon out of him, just as he made a weapon out of you."

traits.locale_text: « L'attachement est une faiblesse. {n}Le murmure de Kibellah est à peine audible, et vous voyez son visage s'assombrir encore davantage.{/n} Vous avez fait de lui une arme, et réciproquement. »

languages.text: "Bağlar kişiyi zayıf kılar." {n}Kibellah'nın fısıltısı güçlükle duyulabiliyor ve yüz ifadesinin daha iç karartıcı hâle geldiğini görüyorsun.{/n} "Onu bir silaha dönüştürdün, tıpkı onun seni bir silaha dönüştürdüğü gibi."
languages.original_text: "Attachment makes us weak." {n}Kibellah's whisper is barely audible, and you see her face grow more dismal still.{/n} "You made a weapon out of him, just as he made a weapon out of you."
